titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid to the Smith College Junior Year for International Studies records CA.MS.01041

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-04-24 14:25:27 -0400.

did.unittitle: Smith College Junior Year for International Studies records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Smith College Junior Year for International Studies

physdesc.extent: (2 record carton, 8 archive letter boxes, 1 archive half letter boxes, 1 flat box small)

did.abstract: Since 1925, the Office for International Study promotes study abroad opportunities that are in keeping with the educational aims of the college. Smith College Junior Year for International Studies records consist of correspondence, meeting notes, photos, office files. The records span the years from 1925-2012.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to researchers according to the regulations of the College Archives. Any material relating to grades or personal information of students is restricted - please contact College Archives staff.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: These materials were transferred to College Archives in years 2007, 2012 and 2017.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection's 12 boxes are arranged in 3 accessions. Where applicable, materials are arranged by country and year.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Office for International Study promotes study abroad opportunities that are in keeping with the educational aims of the college. The office was created in 1925. Programs currently exist for Paris (since 1925), Florence (since 1931), Geneva (since 1946) and Hamburg (since 1961). Previously, there were also programs for Spain (1930-1991) and Mexico (1937-1952). The office is also called "Junior Year Abroad" or "Study Abroad".

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Junior Year for International Studies records, Smith College Archives, MS CA 01041, Smith College Special Collections, Northampton, Massachusetts.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Archives has not processed, rearrarranged, or weeded the materials in any way since their transfer.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: See also Smith College Special Programs files.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Smith College Junior Year for International Studies records consist of correspondence, meeting notes, photos, office files. The records span the years from 1925-2012.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. All rights to this material are owned by the Smith College Archives. Permission to publish material from the collection must be requested from the College Archives.

did.unittitle: Sarah Dubben Calley Junior Year Abroad papers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records documenting Sarah Dubben Calley's Junior Year Abroad at the University of the Philippines (and subsequent travels) from July 1966 to June 1967. Includes letters home, postcards, a journal, photographs, cassette tape of music, memorabilia, and artwork created by friends. Also includes photographs of a reunion trip in 2004 and an article about the program.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: As a preservation measure, researchers must use digital copies of audiovisual materials in this collection. Please consult with Special Collections staff to request the creation of and access to digital copies.
